altername_name: Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey: It's My Circus: Elephant Friend
name: Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey: Circus Friends: Asian Elephants
overview: Circus Friends Forever! Not everyone can say they are Circus Friends with an Asian Elephant. But you can with Ringling Brothers and Barnum & Bailey Circus Friends: Asian Elephants! Care for your playful pachyderm by making sure it eats well, stays clean and healthy, and gets daily exercise. Hone your training skills to help your friend star in THE GREATEST SHOW ON EARTH Features • Supports DS Download Play• Head-to-Head Multiplayer Play
